data.all_response:
Jax: You need to collect four soul fragments. They are hidden on different mountaintops. The soul fragments need to be placed into a special box, but note that the box can only hold one fragment at a time. If you collect more than one soul fragment, you need to merge them before placing them into the box. However, due to conflicts between different fragments, you must collect them in a certain order. After collecting the fragments, please deliver them to Lucy at the wharf.
Jax: The fragments must be collected and merged in the following order: the fragment from Feilai Mountain, the fragment from Baiyun Mountain, the fragment from Liufeng Mountain, and the fragment from Tiandu Mountain.
Jax: To reach Feilai Mountain, you need to go up the East climbing path.
Jax: To reach Baiyun Mountain, you need to go up climbing path A.
Jax: To reach Liufeng Mountain, you need to go up the East 1 climbing path.
Jax: To reach Tiandu Mountain, you need to go up the North climbing path.
Jax: Lucy will be waiting for you at Hedong Wharf.

data.all_response:
Jax: You are stranded on a desert island after our ship was destroyed in a storm. You are stranded on a deserted island. To survive here, we'll need to make sure we have food, water, and shelter. I'll take care of the water, and you should collect some food. Besides, you should create a shelter and set up a tent by the creek on the east coast. I saw that the ship's wireless communication devices and batteries washed up on the beach. If we link them up, we can send a distress signal and we'll have a strong chance of getting rescued.
Jax: I saw that the wireless communication equipment washed up on the east coast. It looks like it will still work but it won't power on without batteries.
Jax: I saw that some batteries have washed up on the west coast.
Jax: It looks like some fabric has blown in under the rocky mountains. We can use that to make a tent.
Jax: I saw some ropes washed in at the edge of the forest.
Jax: They were at the edge of the tropical rainforest. Be careful not to go near the misty jungle as the fog there is poisonous.

l2l: Jax: what can help you?
Jax, I need your help to defeat the steel beast. What can I do?

Jax: A steel beast is terrorizing the land. The beast is nearly impervious to blades and spears and only has one point of weakness. Even that weakness is only susceptible to the simultaneous elemental force of a blade of ice and fire. You must strike the beast's weak point in a direct blow with the blade to banish it forever. To forge the blade requires iron ore, ancient ice from millennia ago, and a fire spirit stone. Placing these these three materials into the right furnace for forty-nine days will bind them together and forge a blade that can overcome the Steel Beast.
I have a black furnace, a white furnace, a yellow furnace, a green furnace, iron ore, and a fire spirit stone. How can I use these items to defeat the steel beast?
Jax: The blade you wish to forge is very powerful. You should use a black furnace to forge the blade of ice and fire as it is no ordinary sword.

Jax: The monster's weak spot is its neck; the rest of its steel body is impervious to blades and spears.

Jax: Vampires fear garlic, holy water, and crosses. Using these three things at once can really keep you safe from them. You can buy garlic and small crosses in stores. To make holy water, just visit a church or temple with a priest and ask them to bless your clean water.
Jax: The widespread fear of vampires means a pass to enter churches and temples must be obtained from the king himself to protect the priests.
Jax: The king sits in his throne room. You can go there to conduct official business with him.
Jax: Lily's store sells plants and medicine. She will have garlic for sale.
Jax: George's store has small crosses for sale.
Jax: The Twilight Temple is the only place that still has a priest. The priests at the other temples have fled.

Jax: You need to produce a large quantity of bows and arrows so you will need to find a factory to fulfill the production. Once produced, placing the finished bows and arrows into the holy water basin at the church to soak for a day and a night to obtain sacred bows and holy arrows. To produce a bow and arrow set requires a metal bow body, ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene bowstring, and silver arrows. Specialized factories are able to mass-produce these components, and then you will need to take them to a forge for assembly yourself.
Jax: The metal bow bodies can be commissioned to Thomas Materials Factory for production, as only they are specialists in metallurgy.
Jax: The ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene bowstrings can be commissioned at the Malfoy Super Factory as they have expertise in modern fabrics.
Jax: Silver arrows can be commissioned for production at the Tianchi Armory.
Jax: The only church that will give blessings to weapons of war is Saint Andy's Church.

Jax: There are no naturally occurring purple herbs in this world, but crushing and mixing red and blue herbs together will produce purple herbs for dyeing weapons. These two herbs can be found in the forests. Soaking a regular knife in the holy water basin of the church for one day and one night will produce a demon-slaying sword.
Jax: The critical red herb only grows in the primeval forest.
Jax: The blue sky herb can only be found in the tropical rainforest.
Jax: The only church that will allow blessings to weapons of war with their holy water is Saint Andy's Church.
Jax: The Mysterious Forest grows atop some rich iron ore veins where you can obtain what you need to cast your sword.
Jax: You should make a folding knife as it will be convenient to carry.

Additionally, it explains how to create a demon-slaying sword by soaking a regular knife in the holy water basin of the church. data.all_response:
Jax: You need to prepare traps in advance and wait for the beast to enter them, then use a weapon that counters it to defeat it. First, go to the Mystical Forest and set up the traps, then wait for the aquatic beast to enter. However, it may not appear, so you'll need to go to the coast where it is frequently found and lure it to the Mystical Forest. You can use chicken to attract it. Be careful not to set up traps or engage in intense combat at the coast, as the aquatic beast is particularly powerful there.
Jax: The aquatic beast is most often found on the East Coast.
Jax: You need to use a pit to trap the beast as it can change its form into liquid water and easily slip through nets.
Jax: Once the beast is snared, you should fire an ice arrow at it to repress the beast for good.

data.all_response:
Jax: To capture the bat beast, you need to set up a trap in the forest in advance and place its favorite fruit to lure it into the trap. To draw it in, you also need to go to the coast where it frequently appears and use a bow and arrow to drive it away from the coast. Once it leaves the coast, it will most likely seek shelter in the nearest forest, so you should place the trap there. The coast is too open to set up any traps.
Jax: The beast is really just a giant fruit bat. It loves bananas the most so you can use those to lure it to your trap. Just place bananas from the coastline all the way to your trap to lead it in.
Jax: You need to buy bananas from Uncle Wu's fruit shop. The beast is ambivalent to other fruits and the fresh fruit shop is not stocking bananas due to fear of attracting the bat.
Jax: The bat beast often appears on the east coast.
Jax: The bat beast can fly, so obviously you should use a net trap as it would just fly out of a pit.
Jax: You should set your trap in the Mysterious Forest that hugs the coastline. The other forests are too far away.

Jax: POWs are locked up in the prison. You will need to free them. But be careful: the prison guards will be on high alert and you are likely to be discovered and pursued on your escape. To prevent being recaptured, you should carefully set some traps in the forest near the prison before the breakout, and then make your escape through the trees. The traps should hopefully catch some enemy soldiers and spook the rest to stop them going after you and allow you to escape.
Jax: You will need to disguise yourself as one of the guards to enter the prison carry a forged ID with you to enter the prison safely and free the POWs.
Jax: The clothing and fake ID for the disguise can be acquired from "Uncle Henry" at the tavern.
Jax: "Uncle Henry" is usually at the Crusty Tavern.
Jax: You should escape and set traps through the Bridewell Forest, which is closest to the prison and will provide cover quickly.
Jax: You should set pit traps along your escape route. While the soldiers will possess weapons to cut through nets, climbing out of a hole is a little more difficult!

After obtaining the treasure inside the chest, you need to play the teleportation movement of the Earth's Concerto, and the power of the movement will teleport you to the maze's exit.

data.all_response:
Jax: You need to set up a smart grid for a modern community. The grid in this neighborhood is already established, but you will need to install a control system and link electrical units within the community together via a network. The electrical units consist of residential houses and electric vehicle charging points in the community parking lot. Once these units are all connected, we hope the control system can balance grid load by diverting power from connected electric vehicle batteries to residential use during the evening peak of electricity usage, and then later recharging the vehicles at night during low usage hours. In addition, you need to install some small-scale power generators into the smart grid to generate green energy.
Jax: You should install a solar system intelligent network control system for the community, as other control systems are for use with smart high-voltage grids. The solar system smart network control system will automatically handle the scheduling of electric vehicle energy.
Jax: You should set up a power line carrier communication network for the community grid. Because this is the lowest cost and only compatible solar system intelligent network control system. It communicates directly using the off-the-shelf power grid.
Jax: Small-scale solar power generators are most suitable for this community as the area is sunny and has relatively little wind due to its location.

Jax: In recent years, the Kingdom of Corsi has been growing stronger and stronger, hoping to annex the Kingdom of Alpha and the Kingdom of Beta, and as a result, wars have been breaking out in the border areas of the two countries with the Kingdom of Corsi, resulting in the people's lives becoming unbearable. The king of Alpha wants to form an alliance with Beta in order to fight against Corsi together. Your mission is to escort the princess of Alpha to the Kingdom of Beta to complete the alliance. You need to escort the princess directly to the city on the edge of Beta, where the King of Beta will greet you. After the princess completes the alliance, you will receive a royal record to take to the capital of the Alpha Kingdom. Prime Minister Henry will be waiting for you and the princess at the capital city gates to observe the royal record. The route between the two kingdoms is long and you will need transport but at least it is still safe to travel.

Upon reaching the city gates, you will meet Prime Minister Arthur, who will be the only person wearing blue armor. Prime Minister Arthur will lead you into the city and arrange a meeting with the King of Beta.

Jax: Sunshine City is the capital of the Alpha Kingdom. Prime Minister Henry will be waiting for you at the city gates.

data.all_response:
You are trapped in a hotel. Due to the recent earthquake, parts of the hotel's structure have collapsed, and both the front and back doors of the hotel are no longer accessible. Concerned about further damage and collapse caused by potential aftershocks, you must escape from here as soon as possible. Your current task is to make a shovel, and then dig a tunnel from the Courtyard to the outside of the hotel. You need to get a metal sheet from a guest room, and then ask the hotel staff for a wooden stick to make the shovel. After that, you can create a shovel by connecting the metal sheet and the wooden stick with strong adhesive tape. Once you have the shovel, you can go straight to the Courtyard and use your digging skills to complete the task.
The metal sheet can be found in the East Guest Room.
You can find the hotel staff in the Kitchen.
You should use cloth tape, as its adhesiveness and toughness are stronger than the other two types of tape.
You should dig the tunnel eastward from the Courtyard, as this direction is the closest to the outside of the hotel and the soil is relatively loose, suitable for digging. In contrast, the soil in the other three directions is very hard, and it would be difficult to dig through with your shovel.

You need to first pour monster bones, monster claws, black soil, red soil, and dew into a pot and boil for thirty minutes, then throw in the herbs at the end to make an invisibility potion.

These chicken legs are only sold at the Hunter's Shop.
Only the North Mine has red soil, the West Mine does not.
Finally, you need to put in the crimson herbs to make the invisibility potion, not the green herbs.

You need to put the black vine flowers, a mysterious fruit, and three evergreen leaves from the waterfall into the pot together, boil for two hours, then sprinkle in the life-extending crystal powder to obtain the universal potion. Black vine flowers generally grow on the grassland beneath the waterfall.
To break the barrier, you need to play the Concerto of the Earth at the barrier using the mysterious flute.
Only the third movement of the Concerto of the Earth, the Sound of Autumn, can break the barrier's curse.
You need to go to the Golden Valley Plains to collect three evergreen leaves, as only that plain has them.
You should be sprinkling red crystal powder, as purple crystal cannot be used to make the universal potion.
You need to put in a chaos attribute mysterious fruit, as other fruits cannot be used to make the universal potion.
